com.cypher.hardwarecommunication

Class BreadMote

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cypher.hardwarecommunication.BreadMote

  • public final class BreadMote
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the starting point for BreadMote operations. After it has been initialized, you can use it to scan for nearby devices or connect to nearby/remote devices.

    • Method Summary

      Connects to the specified host on the current network

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context)
        Prepares the BreadMote SDK. This should be called only once, such as in your application's onCreate.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context used to initialize the SDK

      • scan

        public static void scan(ConnectionType connectionType)
        Begins a scan for nearby devices
        Parameters:
        connectionType - The type of scan to be started
        See Also:
        addListener(ScanListener), removeListener(ScanListener)

      • terminate

        public static void terminate()
        Cleans up all resources related to scanning, connecting, or interacting with a device

      • connectBluetooth

        public static boolean connectBluetooth(Device device)
        Connects to the specified device over Bluetooth
        Parameters:
        device - The device to connect to
        Returns:
        true if the connection process could be successfully started, false otherwise
        See Also:
        scan(ConnectionType), addListener(ConnectionListener), removeListener(ConnectionListener)

      • connectWiFi

        public static boolean connectWiFi(Device device,
                                  java.lang.String password,
                                  java.lang.String host,
                                  int port)
        Connects to the specified WiFi network
        Parameters:
        device - The network to connect to
        password - The password needed to connect to the network
        host - The host to connect to
        port - The port to use for connecting to the host
        Returns:
        true if the connection process could be successfully started, false otherwise
        See Also:
        scan(ConnectionType), addListener(ConnectionListener), removeListener(ConnectionListener)

      • connectWiFi

        public static boolean connectWiFi(java.lang.String host,
                                  int port)
        Connects to the specified host on the current network
        Parameters:
        host - The host to connect to
        port - The port to use for connecting to the host
        Returns:
        true if the connection process could be successfully started, false otherwise
        See Also:
        addListener(ConnectionListener), removeListener(ConnectionListener)

        scanListener - The listener to be registered

      • removeListener

        public static boolean removeListener(ScanListener scanListener)
        Unregisteres a listener from scan(ConnectionType) events
        Parameters:

        Returns:
